title: Remove all memory cards from MemoriesSection

requirements.summary: Remove all three memory cards from the MemoriesSection component so that the 'Our Memories' section renders no cards at all
acceptanceCriteria: No memory cards are visible anywhere on the page.
The MemoriesSection component either renders nothing or is removed from App.tsx entirely.
The rest of the page (Hero, ForgivenessPage, LetterSection, Footer) remains intact and unaffected.
No broken layout or empty whitespace block is left behind where the memory cards used to be.

file_operations.description: Remove all three hardcoded memory cards from the component. Update the component to return null or an empty fragment so it renders nothing, removing the section heading, card grid, and all card elements entirely.

Remove the MemoriesSection component import and its usage from the component tree, ensuring the page renders only Hero → ForgivenessPage → LetterSection → Footer in sequence with no empty blocks or broken layout.
